metadata.description: Example parameters for the Automated Audio Summarization with OpenAI and Functions Bicep template
Environment designation (dev, test, prod) - affects naming and configuration
Unique suffix for resource names. Use uniqueString(resourceGroup().id) for automatic generation, or provide a custom value like 'demo001'
Azure OpenAI pricing tier. S0 is the standard tier for production workloads
Storage account replication type. LRS for local redundancy, GRS for geo-redundancy
Azure Functions runtime version. ~4 is the latest stable version
Python runtime version for Function App. 3.12 is the latest supported version
Throughput Units (TPU) for Whisper model deployment. Minimum is 10, increase for higher throughput
Throughput Units (TPU) for GPT-4 model deployment. Minimum is 10, increase for higher throughput
